expo.name: Banana App - Donor

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Our app uses your camera to scan QR codes to facilitate transactions between donor and client users, enabling a swift and secure exchange of food that would otherwise go to waste.

expo.description: The Banana App provides donors (supermarkets, groceries, produce stands, restaurants) a time-sensitive platform to donate items that are considered not aesthetically-pleasing for market display or sale but still edible and in good condition. Items will be given directly to verified clients (low-income family, homeless individuals) upon successful application.
